#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int
int main()
{
	 ll t;
	 cin>>t;
	 while(t--)
	 {
	  ll n,i;
	  cin>>n;
        ll a[n];
	  for( i=0;i<n;i++)
	   cin>>a[i];
 	   sort(a,a+n);
         ll count=0;
	   for(i=1;i<n;i++)
	    if(a[i]-a[i-1]>=1)
        count++;
    cout<<count<<"\n";
	 }
	 return 0;
}
